award_title: Collaborative Research: Joint Electrical and Vibrational Spectroscopic Investigation of Volatile-carrying Minerals,  and Implications for Fluid Transport in Subduction Zones
subject: Getting others to actually use your calibration methods?
body:
You're building calibration standards for the community, but there's always that gap between "we've developed this method" and someone at another lab actually running it.

I built Ouro to make computational methods discoverable and reusableâ€”so your analysis pipelines can be infrastructure others cite, not just text in a paper.

Worth a quick chat? No rush with the holidays, but happy to show you what we're doing.

Best,

Matt Moderwell
https://ouro.foundation
